summary.span: 提供一组用于查询实现 的对象的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）方法。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying objects that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的方法提供的标准查询运算符的实现的查询数据源实现。The methods in this class provide an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是通用方法，它们按照[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，使你能够在任何数据中表示遍历、 筛选和投影运算。基于网络的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 大多数此类中的方法被定义为扩展的扩展方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend . 这意味着它们可以通过调用类似于实例方法实现的任何对象。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 在返回值的序列的查询中使用的方法也不会占用目标数据，直到枚举查询对象。Methods that are used in a query that returns a sequence of values do not consume the target data until the query object is enumerated. 这称为延迟执行。This is known as deferred execution. 在返回单一实例值的查询中使用的方法执行，并立即使用目标数据。Methods that are used in a query that returns a singleton value execute and consume the target data immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以很容易地对一个序列的值执行计算。The method makes it simple to perform a calculation over a sequence of values. 通过调用此方法适用`func`中每个元素的一次`source`除外的第一个。This method works by calling `func` one time for each element in `source` except the first one. 每次`func`调用时，将从序列和聚合的值传递的两个元素 (作为第一个参数`func`)。Each time `func` is called, passes both the element from the sequence and an aggregated value (as the first argument to `func`). 第一个元素`source`用作初始的聚合值。The first element of `source` is used as the initial aggregate value. 结果`func`替换以前的聚合的值。The result of `func` replaces the previous aggregated value. 返回的最终结果`func`。 returns the final result of `func`. 此重载方法不适合所有情况下，因为它使用的第一个元素`source`作为初始的聚合值。This overload of the method isn't suitable for all cases because it uses the first element of `source` as the initial aggregate value. 如果返回值应包括的元素，则应选择另一个重载`source`满足特定条件。You should choose another overload if the return value should include only the elements of `source` that meet a certain condition. 例如，此重载不可靠，如果你想要对其求和的中的偶数数字`source`。For example, this overload isn't reliable if you want to calculate the sum of the even numbers in `source`. 结果会不正确，如果第一个元素为奇数而不是甚至。The result will be incorrect if the first element is odd instead of even. 若要简化常见聚合操作，标准查询运算符，还包括一般用途计数方法， ，和四个数字的聚合方法，即， ， ，和。To simplify common aggregation operations, the standard query operators also include a general purpose count method, , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用反转字符串中单词的顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to reverse the order of words in a string by using . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法不返回集合中的所有元素。This method does not return all the elements of a collection. 相反，它确定集合中的所有元素是否都满足条件。Instead, it determines whether all the elements of a collection satisfy a condition. 枚举`source`可以确定结果时，就会立即停止。The enumeration of `source` is stopped as soon as the result can be determined. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Aggregate Into All()`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into All()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以确定序列中的所有元素是否都满足条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition. 变量`allStartWithB`适用如果所有宠物名称以"B"都开头，或如果`pets`数组为空。Variable `allStartWithB` is true if all the pet names start with "B" or if the `pets` array is empty. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#4)] 布尔值，方法返回的谓词通常用于`where`子句 (`Where`中的子句[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 或直接调用方法。The Boolean value that the method returns is typically used in the predicate of a `where` clause (`Where` clause in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) or a direct call to the method. 下面的示例演示的这种用法`All`方法。The following example demonstrates this use of the `All` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不起作用而要更改的编译时类型`source`实现的类型从到本身。The method has no effect other than to change the compile-time type of `source` from a type that implements to itself. 可用于查询实现当序列实现之间选择但也有一组不同的可用公共查询方法。 can be used to choose between query implementations when a sequence implements but also has a different set of public query methods available. 例如，给定泛型类`Table`实现和有它自己的方法，如`Where`， `Select`，和`SelectMany`，调用`Where`将调用公共`Where`方法`Table`.For example, given a generic class `Table` that implements and has its own methods such as `Where`, `Select`, and `SelectMany`, a call to `Where` would invoke the public `Where` method of `Table`. A`Table`表示数据库表的类型可能具有`Where`将谓词参数为表达式树，并将该树到 SQL 转换为远程执行的方法。A `Table` type that represents a database table could have a `Where` method that takes the predicate argument as an expression tree and converts the tree to SQL for remote execution. 如果远程执行不所需，例如谓词时，将调用本地方法，因为方法可以用于隐藏自定义方法，并改为提供的标准查询运算符。If remote execution is not desired, for example because the predicate invokes a local method, the method can be used to hide the custom methods and instead make the standard query operators available. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来隐藏类型的自定义`Where`时所需的标准查询运算符实现的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use to hide a type's custom `Where` method when the standard query operator implementation is desired. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法实现了标准查询运算符调用非泛型集合上，通过提供必要的类型信息。The method enables the standard query operators to be invoked on non-generic collections by supplying the necessary type information. 例如，不实现，而通过调用上对象，然后可以使用标准查询运算符查询该序列。For example, does not implement , but by calling on the object, the standard query operators can then be used to query the sequence. 如果一个元素无法转换为类型`TResult`，此方法将引发。If an element cannot be converted to type `TResult`, this method throws a . 此方法的源序列是，这意味着元素具有的编译时静态类型`object`。The source sequence for this method is , which means the elements have the compile-time static type of `object`. 此方法执行的唯一类型转换为引用转换和取消装箱转换。The only type conversions that are performed by this method are reference conversions and unboxing conversions. 集合中的元素的运行时类型必须匹配的目标类型，或对于值类型的元素的运行时类型必须是目标类型的装箱转换的结果。The runtime type of the elements in the collection must match the target type, or in the case of value types, the runtime type of elements must be the result of a boxing conversion of the target type. 不允许其他转换类型，如不同的数值类型之间。Other conversion types, such as those between different numeric types, are not allowed. 若要获取可以转换为类型的元素`TResult`，使用方法而不是。To obtain only those elements that can be converted to type `TResult`, use the method instead of . 在查询表达式中，显式类型化的迭代变量都会转换为的调用。In a query expression, an explicitly typed iteration variable translates to an invocation of . 此示例演示一个显式类型化的范围变量的语法。This example shows the syntax for an explicitly typed range variable. ```csharp from int i in objects ``` ```vb From i As Integer In objects ``` 使用`select`查询执行隐式数值转换等其他转换类型的子句。Use the `select` clause of a query to perform other conversion types, like the implicit numeric conversions. 下面的示例使用这两个`Cast`方法和一个`select`语句将装箱的整数的序列转换为双精度型值的序列。The following example uses both the `Cast` method and a `select` statement to convert a sequence of boxed integers to a sequence of doubles. ```csharp IEnumerable sequence = Enumerable.Range(0, 10); var doubles = from int item in sequence select (double)item; ``` ```vb Dim sequence As IEnumerable = Enumerable.Range(0, 10) Dim doubles = From item As Integer In sequence Select CType(item, Double) ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用上启用标准查询运算符的使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use to enable the use of the standard query operators on an . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#19)]

[!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#20)] 连接两个序列的一种备用方法是构造一个集合，例如一个数组的序列，然后将应用方法，将其传递标识选择器函数。An alternative way of concatenating two sequences is to construct a collection, for example an array, of sequences and then apply the method, passing it the identity selector function. 下面的示例演示的这种用法。The following example demonstrates this use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 两个集的差集定义为不会出现在第二个集的第一组的成员。The set difference of two sets is defined as the members of the first set that do not appear in the second set. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回这些元素在`first`，不显示在`second`。This method returns those elements in `first` that do not appear in `second`. 它也不返回这些元素在`second`，不显示在`first`。It does not also return those elements in `second` that do not appear in `first`. 默认的相等比较， ，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己和类型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用仅在第一个序列中出现的方法来比较两个数字的序列并将其返回元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to compare two sequences of numbers and return elements that appear only in the first sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#34)] 如果你想要比较的某些自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现helperclass 中的泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helperclass. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象方法，如下面的示例中所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法返回的集合对象，一个遇到每个非重复键。The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是也具有一个其元素与关联的密钥。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 对象都根据顺序中的元素的顺序生成`source`生成每个的第一个键。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 分组中的元素都按顺序生成它们的元素出现在生成`source`。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order that the elements that produced them appear in `source`. 默认相等比较器用于比较键。The default equality comparer is used to compare keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用序列的元素进行分组。The following code example demonstrates how to use to group the elements of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 默认的相等比较， ，用于哈希处理和对键进行比较。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 产生分层结果，这意味着从元素`outer`的匹配元素的集合与配对`inner`。 produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 可用于你的结果的基础的每个元素的匹配项的整个集`outer`。`GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each A 和 B 的两个集的交集定义为包含的同时出现在 B 中的所有元素，但没有其他元素的集。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，产生发生在这两个序列中出现的顺序中的非重复元素`first`。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 默认的相等比较， ，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己和类型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用每两个整数的序列中返回显示的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers. other sequence are included in the results. 同等联接是一种联接中的键比较是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左外部联接运算具有没有专用的标准查询运算符，但可以使用执行方法。A left outer join operation has no remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 如果`omparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， ，用于哈希处理和对键进行比较。If c`omparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 联接是指相互关联的基于公用密钥信息的两个源元素的操作。A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key. 提供两个信息源以及依据它们相匹配在一个方法调用中的键。 brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call. 这不同于使用`SelectMany`，这要求多个方法调用，以便执行相同的操作。This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation. 保留的元素的顺序`outer`，以及对于每种这些元素，匹配元素的顺序`inner`。 preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`. 在关系数据库术语中，方法实现内部的同等联接。In relational database terms, the method implements an inner equijoin. 内部，则意味着，在结果中包含另一个序列中具有匹配项的元素。'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results. 同等联接是一种联接中的键比较是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左外部联接运算具有没有专用的标准查询运算符，但可以使用执行方法。A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the method. 请参阅[联接运算](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`. 方法不提供任何方式来指定默认值。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果你想要指定默认值以外`default(TSource)`，使用示例部分中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用上的空数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#45)] 有时的值`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后将更改如有必要，你可以使用方法，以指定你想要集合为空时使用的默认值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然后，调用若要获取最后一个元素。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1 的数字天的月份的集合是否为空。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 由于输入一个整数默认值为 0，这不符合任何一天的月份，必须指定默认值为 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 后执行完查询后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 通过使用来获取第二个结果变量指定默认值为 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#127](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#127)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#127](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#127)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法返回这些元素在`source`可以转换为类型`TResult`。The method returns only those elements in `source` that can be cast to type `TResult`. 若要改为收到一个异常，如果一个元素无法转换为类型`TResult`，使用。To instead receive an exception if an element cannot be cast to type `TResult`, use . 此方法是一个可以应用于集合具有非参数化类型，如几个标准查询运算符方法。This method is one of the few standard query operator methods that can be applied to a collection that has a non-parameterized type, such as an . 这是因为扩展类型。This is because extends the type . 不能仅应用于基于的集合上参数化类型，但基于非参数化的集合还需要键入。 cannot only be applied to collections that are based on the parameterized type, but collections that are based on the non-parameterized type also. 通过应用到实现的集合，您能够通过使用标准查询运算符查询的集合。By applying to a collection that implements , you gain the ability to query the collection by using the standard query operators. 例如，如果指定的类型参数到将返回类型的对象`IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定 identity 函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 两种方法被定义为扩展类型，这是此方法的返回类型。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 这两种方法，即`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，使您能够指定要对序列进行排序的其他排序条件。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 和`ThenByDescending`还返回，这意味着任意数量的连续调用`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以进行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或上调用的结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法使用默认比较器比较键。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法中， `orderby` (Visual C#) 或`Order By`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby` (Visual C#) or `Order By` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用序列的元素进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定 identity 函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 两种方法被定义为扩展类型，这是此方法的返回类型。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 这两种方法，即`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，使您能够指定要对序列进行排序的其他排序条件。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 和`ThenByDescending`还返回，这意味着任意数量的连续调用`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以进行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或上调用的结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法中， `orderby descending` (Visual C#) 或`Order By Descending`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby descending` (Visual C#) or `Order By Descending` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 第一个参数`selector`表示要处理的元素。The first argument to `selector` represents the element to process. 第二个参数`selector`表示源序列中该元素的从零开始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 如果元素处于已知的顺序，并且你想要使用执行某些操作的特定索引处的元素为例，这会很有用。This can be useful if the elements are in a known order and you want to do something with an element at a particular index, for example. 如果你想要检索的一个或多个元素的索引，它可以同时有用。It can also be useful if you want to retrieve the index of one or more elements. 此投影方法要求的转换函数`selector`，以便生成一个值，为源序列中的每个值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，本身为一个集合，它负责的使用者手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually. 在这种情况下，它可能更适合你的查询以返回单个合并的序列的值。In such a situation, it might be better for your query to return a single coalesced sequence of values. 若要实现此目的，使用方法而不是。To achieve this, use the method instead of . 尽管`SelectMany`工作原理类似于`Select`，它与不同的转换函数返回一个集合，然后通过扩展`SelectMany`它返回之前。Although `SelectMany` works similarly to `Select`, it differs in that the transform function returns a collection that is then expanded by `SelectMany` before it is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对一系列值进行投影并使用每个元素的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use to project over a sequence of values and use the index of each element. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#76](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#76)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#76](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#76)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法枚举输入的序列中，使用转换函数映射到每个元素，然后枚举并生成的每个此类元素对象。The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是说，每个元素的`source`，`selector`调用并返回一个值序列。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然后将平展集合到一维此二维集合并将其返回。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 例如，如果查询使用获取顺序 (类型的`Order`) 对于数据库中每个客户，结果为类型`IEnumerable`在 C# 或`IEnumerable(Of Order)`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。For example, if a query uses to obtain the orders (of type `Order`) for each customer in a database, the result is of type `IEnumerable` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of Order)` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 如果改为查询使用若要获取订单的订单集合的集合不合并并且也是结果为类型`IEnumerable>`在 C# 或`IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。If instead the query uses to obtain the orders, the collection of collections of orders is not combined and the result is of type `IEnumerable>` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在查询表达式语法中，每个`from`子句 (Visual C#) 或`From`子句 ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 在初始后一个转换为的调用。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要在数组上执行的一到多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 时你需要的元素，方法会很有用`source`的调用后发生的查询逻辑的作用域中。The method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to . 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the Example section for a code example. 如果类型的对象之间没有双向关系`TSource`和类型的对象`TCollection`，即，如果类型的对象`TCollection`提供一个属性来检索`TSource`对象生成，则不需要这样做重载。If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of . 相反，你可以使用和向后定位到`TSource`对象通过`TCollection`对象。Instead, you can use and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object. 在查询表达式语法中，每个`from`子句 (Visual C#) 或`From`子句 ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 在初始后一个转换为的调用。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要在数组上执行的一到多投影，并且使用结果选择器函数以防止最终调用的作用域中的源序列的每个相应元素`Select`。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array and use a result selector function to keep each corresponding element from the source sequence in scope for the final call to `Select`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 时你需要的元素，方法会很有用`source`的调用后发生的查询逻辑的作用域中。The method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to . 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the Example section for a code example. 如果类型的对象之间没有双向关系`TSource`和类型的对象`TCollection`，即，如果类型的对象`TCollection`提供一个属性来检索`TSource`对象生成，则不需要这样做重载。If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of . 相反，你可以使用和向后定位到`TSource`对象通过`TCollection`对象。Instead, you can use and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 如果`source`少于`count`元素为一个空返回。If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty is returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零的所有元素`source`都生成。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以跳过指定的数量的已排序数组中的元素，并返回剩余元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements. summary.span: 如果指定的条件为 true，则跳过序列中的元素，然后返回剩余的元素。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。The method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 此方法可测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并跳过的元素，如果结果为`true`。This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 将在谓词函数返回后`false`的元素，该元素和中的剩余元素`source`都生成的其他调用且`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`返回`true`的所有元素在顺序中，一个空返回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip While`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要跳过数组的元素，只要是 true 的条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#88)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#88)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法进行测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并跳过的元素，如果结果为`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 将在谓词函数返回后`false`的元素，该元素和中的剩余元素`source`都生成的其他调用且`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`返回`true`的所有元素在顺序中，一个空返回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 第一个参数`predicate`表示要测试的元素。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二个参数表示中的元素的从零开始索引`source`。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip While`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要跳过数组的元素，只要是 true 取决于元素的索引的条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 枚举`source`和生成元素，直到`count`在生成的元素或`source`不包含任何更多的元素。 enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements. 如果`count`超过中的元素数`source`的所有元素`source`返回。If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零，`source`不是枚举和空的返回。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty is returned. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Take`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从序列的开头返回元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法进行测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并生成元素，如果结果为`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`. 当谓词函数返回时，将停止枚举`false`的元素时，或者当`source`不包含任何更多的元素。Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Take While`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从序列的开头返回元素，只要是 true 的条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定 identity 函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 和被定义为扩展类型，这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 这种设计，可通过将应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或上调用的结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法使用默认比较器比较键。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法中， `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) 或`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用执行辅助排序的序列中的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定 identity 函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 和被定义为扩展类型，这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 这种设计，可通过将应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或上调用的结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在 Visual C# 查询表达式语法中，`orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending`子句转换为的调用。In Visual C# query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending` clause translates to an invocation of . 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending`子句转换为的调用。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending` clause translates to an invocation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 此方法从结果集中排除重复项。This method excludes duplicates from the return set. 这是到不同的行为方法，包括重复项的输入序列中返回的所有元素。This is different behavior to the method, which returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates. 默认的相等比较， ，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己和类型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，枚举`first`和`second`按此顺序并生成尚未生成每个元素。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以获取两个整数的序列的并集。The following code example demonstrates how to use to obtain the union of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#109)] 如果你想要比较的自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现helperclass 中的泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helperclass. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象方法，如下面的示例中所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法将合并第一个序列的每个的元素与第二个序列中具有相同的索引的元素。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同数量的元素，该方法将序列合并直到到达其中之一的结尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一个序列具有三个元素，并且另一个具有四个，则结果序列需要仅三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#200)]
